cloud_init.user_data:
config system global 
  set hostname fortigate
end 
 
config system interface 
  edit port1 
    set mode dhcp 
    set allowaccess https ssh ping fgfm
    set type physical 
    set snmp-index 1 
  next 
end

config system virtual-wire-pair 
  edit fortigate  
    set member port2 port3 
    set wildcard-vlan enable 
    set vlan-filter 567-568 
  next 
end

cloud_init.user_data:
config system global 
  set hostname fortigate
end 
 
config system interface 
  edit port1 
    set mode dhcp 
    set allowaccess https ssh ping fgfm
    set type physical 
    set snmp-index 1 
  next 
end

config system virtual-wire-pair 
  edit fortigate  
    set member port2 port3 
    set wildcard-vlan enable 
    set vlan-filter 567-568 
  next 
end

action_list.description: This action is used to scale out the no of fortigate vms on the cluster
action_list.name: ScaleOut
